mapper.select: select a.*, c.* from quiz.q_answers a left join quiz.q_paper aa on a.paper_id = aa.paper_id left join quiz.q_paper_questions b on a.paper_id = b.paper_id left join quiz.q_question c on b.question_id = c.question_id where a.answer_id = #{answerId} and aa.state != -1 order by b.id;

select a.*, c.* from quiz.q_answers a left join quiz.q_paper aa on a.paper_id = aa.paper_id left join quiz.q_paper_questions b on a.paper_id = b.paper_id left join quiz.q_question c on b.question_id = c.question_id where a.responder_user_id = #{userId} and aa.state != -1 order by a.answer_id, b.id;
